DOC.brief_summary: Study to assess efficacy, tolerability and safety parameters of a three month ALNA®OCAS® -treatment with special respect to nocturia
DOC.brief_title: The Impact of Alna® Ocas® on Nocturia in Patients With Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms Suggestive of Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia (LUTS/BPH)
DOC.criteria: Indication for treatment with ALNA®OCAS® according to the prescribing information for a minimum period of three months Patients fulfilling one of the general or specific contraindications listed in the ALNA®OCAS® Summary of Product Characteristics (SPC), particularly patients with known hypersensitivities against tamsulosin hydrochloride or any other ingredient of the product, orthostatic dysregulation or severe liver insufficiency could not be included in the Post Marketing Study (PMS) study
